injectCSS: section#main_shell{border-color:#282828;position:relative;left:29vh;height:94.2%;bottom:1vh;border-bottom-left-radius: 1.7vh;border-top-left-radius: 1.7vh;border-bottom-right-radius: 0;border-top-right-radius: 0;background:#282828;}ul#main_shell_tabs{margin-bottom:0.5vh;background: var(--color_light_black);border-bottom:none;flex-direction: row-reverse;}h1#main_shell_greeting{color:#ebdbb2;}section#main_shell>h3.title{left:calc(29vh + 16.5vw)!important;}section#mod_column_right{left:28.5vh!important;}section#mod_column_right>h3.title{left:29.6vh!important;}div#mod_netstat_inner{height:6.85vh;padding-top:.5vh;}div#mod_globe_innercontainer{padding-bottom:.95vh;}div#mod_conninfo canvas{height:8vh!important;} @media (aspect-ratio:64/27) {section#mod_column_left > h3.title{left:1.6vh!important}section#mod_column_left{left:1vh !important}section#mod_column_right > h3.title{left:44vh!important}section#mod_column_right{left:43vh !important}section#main_shell > h3.title{left:37vw !important;width:60% !important}section#main_shell{left:41vh;width:60%}}section.mod_column > div h1:first-child>i{letter-spacing: .01vh;bottom:1.9vh !important;}div#mod_toplist > h1{margin: 0 0 -5vh;}div#mod_netstat_inner > h1:first-child{margin-bottom: -0.8vh;}div#mod_globe_innercontainer > h1:first-child, div#mod_conninfo_innercontainer > h1:first-child{margin: 0 0 -2vh;}div#mod_toplist::after{top:-13.9vh;}section>h3.title:first-child::after{right:-0.85vh;bottom:-0.6vh;}ul#main_shell_tabs>li.active>p{transform: skewX(35deg) scale(0.8);position:relative;top:-0.1vh;letter-spacing:0.1vh;}ul#main_shell_tabs>li{background:var(--color_light_black);color:#ebdbb2;transform:skewX(-35deg);z-index:15;}ul#main_shell_tabs>li.active{background:#665c54;color:#d79921;transform: skewX(-35deg) scale(1.2);z-index:10;}ul#main_shell_tabs>li>p{transform:skewX(35deg)}ul#main_shell_tabs>li:not(:first-child){border-left:none;border-right:.18vh solid rgba(var(--color_r),var(--color_g),var(--color_b),.5);}progress::-webkit-progress-value {background: #689d6a !important;}progress::-webkit-progress-bar {background: #504945 !important;}div.mod_ramwatcher_point.free, div.mod_ramwatcher_point.available {background: #d65d0e !important;opacity: 1 !important;}div.mod_ramwatcher_point.active {opacity: 0.2 !important;}div#mod_netstat_innercontainer > div:nth-child(2) > h2 {color: #458588;}section#keyboard{display:none;}section#filesystem{position:absolute;top:inherit;bottom:0.925vh;left:0.8vh;width:31.5vw;margin-top:5vh;}div#fs_disp_container{width:31.5vw;height:21vh;margin-top:5vh;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill, minmax(7.5vh,1fr));grid-auto-rows:7.5vh;grid-gap:.9vh;}div#fs_disp_container > *{width:7.5vh;height:7.5vh;}div#fs_disp_container > * > svg{width:4vh;}div.fs_disp_showDisks > svg, div.fs_disp_up > svg{fill:#98971a !important;}section#filesystem > h3.title{width:31.5vw;}section > h3.title:first-child > p:first-child{width: 20%;}section > h3.title:first-child > p:last-child{width: 78.5%;}div#fs_space_bar > progress{width:51%;position:relative;left:20%;}div#fs_disp_container > * > h3{font-size:1.1vh;}
